modName: Beastier sword FX - Deeper sounding - Fixed vanilla clipping
summary: Improved originals. Fixed strange clipping on original FX and made them deeper.
descriptionHtml:
Small comparison File added.

I made the sword sounds (swing and sheath) a little more beasty. Tried other mods but they sounded too lightweight! (Especially as I use Cloud\'s huge 1H Buster Sword)

The popping in the default audio is also fixed.
I\'ll possibly update with beastier sounds for other weapon types later, feel free to request.

Shouldn\'t have any compatibility issues with anything.


I work as a sound engineer, so this is kinda what I do.
Luke,
Versed Audio
author: Luke Martin

files.name: Short comparison audio - 4x vanilla sounds then 4x improved
files.fileName: Short comparison audio - 4x vanilla sounds then 4x improved-45599-.rar
